channel.title: DragonTooth Staff (Staff requested by The Elve Age)
channel.description:
It's not lightning because I needed to make a staff for my game as well :). However I left it with many options in a game designing way. The staff has a dragon tooth which imbues it with the dragons affix (Fire, Lightning, Ice, Water w/e) Making it stronger in that element :P. So you could have your players kills some yellow dragons for a tooth drop to make this staff or just drop the staff in general.
I drew a few concepts but I liked this one the most. Oh yeah btw, I also designed it so it wouldn't need textures to make it look good :P. Kinda wish people would move on from RSPS but ohwell :).
Sorry about the wait, it has been done for a few days now but I have been flooded with college work this week. Make sure to open the model as a .obj. You will have to resize it to your needs and make a drop model. Other than that it is all ready to go, The download also comes with a couple other concepts I made for it. (They are all the same links) http://up.ht/SDCrpU http://uppit.com/sv6p3eo52apt/DragonToothStaff_Release.zip [URL=http://up.ht/SDCrpU]DragonToothStaff_Release.zip - 116 KB[/URL] [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv23/uberxgod/DragonToothStaff.png[/img] [s]I will update this as soon as I get the model (Models) done. I will be making the base mesh in Blender then I will sculpt a higher res one with Mudbox for my game :) .[/s]

item.title: DragonTooth Staff (Staff requested by The Elve Age)
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“V 1 N C H, post:4, topic:462595”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=565776.msg4115724#msg4115724 date=1349028228]

Looks like the item of grim reaper lol.
[/quote]
Not really.

This is so cool! Great job! This gives me another idea for another spell.

I think he meant the Scythe.[/quote]I just posted a picture of the grim reaper holding a scythe… I knew what he meant.

Read full topic
